name: Miso Soup
ingredients: 1 sheet nori, cut into small strips

instructions.en: In a medium pot, bring water to a boil and add dashi granules
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkom hrnci priveďte vodu do varu a pridajte granule dashi
instructions.ja: 中サイズの鍋に水を入れて沸騰させ、だしの素を加える

instructions.en: Reduce heat to low and add cubed tofu
instructions.sk: Znížte teplotu na nízku a pridajte nakrájanú tofu
instructions.ja: 弱火にし、さいの目に切った豆腐を加える

instructions.en: In a small bowl, whisk miso paste with a little hot dashi broth until smooth
instructions.sk: V malej miske rozšľahajte miso pastu s trochou horúceho vývaru dashi, až kým nebude hladká
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに味噌を入れ、少量の熱いだし汁を加えてなめらかになるまで混ぜる

instructions.en: Add miso mixture to the pot and stir gently
instructions.sk: Pridajte miso zmes do hrnca a jemne premiešajte
instructions.ja: 鍋に味噌を溶いただし汁を加え、優しくかき混ぜる

instructions.en: Serve in bowls and garnish with sliced green onions and nori strips
instructions.sk: Podávajte v miskách a ozdobte nakrájanou jarnou cibuľkou a prúžkami nori
instructions.ja: 器に注ぎ、刻んだネギと刻みのりを上にのせる
